summary: Thanisha Ivana's digital marketing internship portfolio website - Institute of crafting compelling Digital experience to strategic marketing, creating content and data-driven campaigns. Professional, eye-catching design with three work showcase sections and contact information area
architectural_notes: Single-page portfolio website suitable for digital marketing internship
Three dedicated work showcase areas for portfolio pieces
Portfolio for Thanisha Ivana - personal branding emphasis
Tagline: Institute of crafting compelling Digital experience to strategic marketing
Focus on content and data-driven campaigns expertise
Color scheme: purple and black theme replacing warm neutrals
Background: Personal photo of portfolio owner integrated into design
User has provided a new image to replace current background
Theme colors should be derived from/complement the new image colors

existing_features.title: Create a professional portfolio homepage with an eye-catching but tasteful design that showcases digital marketing work without being tacky
Implement three separate portfolio sections where completed digital marketing works can be displayed
Create a contact information section where personal details and contact methods can be added and displayed

Apply a cohesive visual design system with a modern, sophisticated aesthetic using warm neutral tones (beige, cream, soft terracotta) accented with deep charcoal or forest green, clean sans-serif typography, generous whitespace, and subtle animations that convey professionalism suitable for a digital marketing portfolio
Update the hero section to display 'Thanisha Ivana' as the portfolio owner name instead of the generic digital marketing portfolio branding
Update the hero section description or tagline to read 'Institute of crafting compelling Digital experience to strategic marketing, create a content and data driven campaigns'
Update the HTML document title from 'Digital Marketing Portfolio' to 'Thanisha Ivana Portfolio'
Update footer attribution or any other instances of generic 'Digital Marketing Portfolio' text to reflect 'Thanisha Ivana Portfolio' branding throughout the application

Replace the current warm neutral color palette (beige, cream, soft terracotta, forest green) with a purple and black color scheme throughout the entire application, updating all color variables in frontend/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to use purple tones as primary colors and black as the base/background color
Update the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) to use the user's personal photo as the background image instead of the current placeholder background
Render the generated personal photo background image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it in the Hero component

Update the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) to replace the current background image (thanisha-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) with the newly uploaded WhatsApp Image 2026-02-22 at 11.34.16 AM (1).jpeg without making any modifications to the image itself

Update the color theme throughout the application (frontend/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, and all component files) to complement and harmonize with the colors in the newly uploaded image, using colors derived from the image's palette including burgundy reds, dusty pinks, warm grays, and muted teals from the graffiti art background
Render the newly uploaded WhatsApp Image 2026-02-22 at 11.34.16 AM (1).jpeg as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it in the Hero component

new_feature_requests.summary: Professional portfolio layout with eye-catching but tasteful design

Update the ContactSection component (frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx) to display phone number '7997411133' and email 'thanishaivana004@gmail.com' in the Let's Connect section
Update the backend ContactInfo type and setContactInfo function in backend/main.mo to store phone number '7997411133' and email 'thanishaivana004@gmail.com'
